name: National Energy Services Reunited Corp.
description: National Energy Services Reunited Corp. (NESR) is a leading provider of integrated energy services in the oil and gas sector, particularly focused on the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region. Established through the merger of several key companies in the energy sector, NESR offers a comprehensive suite of services including drilling, completions, and production enhancement. The company aims to revolutionize the energy industry by delivering high-quality, efficient, and cost-effective solutions that meet the challenges of modern energy demands. NESR is committed to sustainability and innovation, identifying opportunities to utilize advanced technologies that minimize environmental impact while maximizing resource recovery. With a strong focus on customer satisfaction and operational excellence, NESR is well-positioned to support its clients in navigating the complexities of the energy landscape. The company's strategic initiatives involve leveraging local expertise and global best practices to enhance operational performance and drive growth in the evolving energy market. NESR's mission is to become the partner of choice for energy companies by delivering exceptional service and value, ultimately contributing to the sustainable development of the energy industry.

key_executives.name: Rami S. M. S. N. A. A. A. A. M. A. Al-Hokail

faq.question: What services does NESR provide?
faq.answer: NESR provides integrated energy services including drilling, completions, and production enhancement.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of NESR?
faq.answer: Sherif Foda is the CEO of National Energy Services Reunited Corp.

faq.question: Where is NESR headquartered?
faq.answer: NESR is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.
